events.message: Hello, I received the wrong item in my order and I would like to request a refund as soon as possible. The product I got is not what I ordered.
The issue has been reviewed and categorized under Refund due to the customer's request for money back after receiving an incorrect product.
An agent from the refund department has been assigned to handle the customer's case regarding the incorrect item delivery.
Hello! My name is Sarah, and I’ll be assisting you with your refund request today. Could you please provide your order number and details about the item you received?
To process your refund quickly, please upload a photo of the item you received along with the original packaging and your order confirmation.
Thanks for your help, Sarah. I have attached photos of the wrong item and the packaging. My order number is #457890. Please let me know the next steps.
Thank you for the information. I’ve initiated the refund process for your order #457890. You should see the refund reflected on your original payment method within 5-7 business days.
I appreciate the prompt assistance and the clear instructions. Looking forward to receiving my refund soon. Thanks for resolving this quickly.
The refund has been confirmed and the case is now resolved. Please reach out if you have any further questions or issues.
Just checking in to ensure that you have received your refund and that everything is satisfactory with your resolution.
Since no further issues were reported, we are closing this support case. Thank you for contacting customer service.
